channel.title: Help
channel.description:
IM trying to add sounds to py private server, instead of npc's talking, im going to make them talk with sound, im using text to speach hardware that comes with windows, i already types the words in, but how to i save it as a wav?
thanks

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @ztr_zac1 ztr zac
item.description:
@ztr_zac1 wrote:

I dont think you can save it with the microsoft software package. Best thing to do is just search google for one. I know there is hundreds of text to speech programs out there

Read full topic
